sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'], }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { otherDataForm: FormGroup; showHorizontalLines: boolean = false; showVerticalLines: boolean = false; constructor(private formBuilder: FormBuilder) { this.otherDataForm = this.formBuilder.group({ width: null, height: null, horizontalLines: null, verticalLines: null, }); } ngOnInit(): void {} getLinesArray(linesCount: number): number[] { return Array.from({ length: linesCount }, (_, index) => index + 1); } onSubmit() { if (this.otherDataForm.valid) { const width = this.otherDataForm.value.width; const height = this.otherDataForm.value.height; if (width > 0 && height > 0) { this.showHorizontalLines = true; this.showVerticalLines = true; } } } get width() { return this.otherDataForm.get('width'); } get height() { return this.otherDataForm.get('height'); } get horizontalLines() { return this.otherDataForm.get('horizontalLines')?.value || 0; } get verticalLines() { return this.otherDataForm.get('verticalLines')?.value || 0; } }
